definition: the act of chipping something, to cut a nick into
details:
noun
- the act of chipping something
= synonyms: chipping, splintering
- (golf) a low running approach shot
= synonyms: chip shot
- electronic equipment consisting of a small crystal of a silicon semiconductor fabricated to carry out a number of electronic functions in an integrated circuit
= synonyms: microchip, micro chip, silicon chip, microprocessor chip
- a small disk-shaped counter used to represent money when gambling
= synonyms: poker chip
- a triangular wooden float attached to the end of a log line
- a mark left after a small piece has been chopped or broken off of something
= synonyms: check
- a thin crisp slice of potato fried in deep fat
= synonyms: potato chip, crisp
- a small fragment of something broken off from the whole
= synonyms: scrap, bit, fleck, flake
- a piece of dried bovine dung
= synonyms: cow chip, cow dung, buffalo chip
verb
- to cut a nick into
= synonyms: nick
- to break a small piece off from
= example: to break a small piece off from
= synonyms: break off, knap
- to break off a piece from a whole
= example: to break off a piece from a whole
= synonyms: come off, break off, chip off, break away
- to form by chipping
= example: to form by chipping
- to play a chip shot
